entry.name: scroll
entry.title: .scroll()
entry.desc: Bind an event handler to the "scroll" JavaScript event, or trigger that event on an element.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

argument.name: eventData
argument.desc: An object containing data that will be passed to the event handler.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

div.p: Instead of .scroll( handler ) or .scroll( eventData, handler ), use .on( "scroll", handler ) or .on( "scroll", eventData, handler ), respectively.
